channel.title: Himat版 Steam 新規ストア公開（画像＋説明）
channel.description: Games whose Steam store page just went public (detected)

item.title: AirLoveEngine Soundtrack（新規追加）
item.description: Experience the soundtrack of AirLoveEngine created by Henry Tahvonen & Brecken Edwards
item.content:encoded:
Experience the soundtrack of AirLoveEngine created by Henry Tahvonen & Brecken Edwards

item.title: Paragnosia: Museum - Demo（新規追加）
item.description: Watch over the Duskheath Museum with a rail-mounted camera. Closed following the death of the conservator, your mission is to photograph the anomalies and exorcise the spirits that have taken possession of the premises. Can you survive the 8 rounds through these mysterious exhibition halls?
item.content:encoded:
Watch over the Duskheath Museum with a rail-mounted camera. Closed following the death of the conservator, your mission is to photograph the anomalies and exorcise the spirits that have taken possession of the premises. Can you survive the 8 rounds through these mysterious exhibition halls?

Steamでページを開く

item.description: This pack contains 7 cosmetic items for use with the USA and the USMC factions.
item.content:encoded:
This pack contains 7 cosmetic items for use with the USA and the USMC factions.

item.title: Paragnosia: Museum（新規追加）
item.description: Watch over the Duskheath Museum with a rail-mounted camera. Closed following a series of disturbing disappearances, your mission is to photograph the anomalies and exorcise the spirits that have taken possession of the premises. Can you survive the 8 rounds through these mysterious exhibition halls?
item.content:encoded:
Watch over the Duskheath Museum with a rail-mounted camera. Closed following a series of disturbing disappearances, your mission is to photograph the anomalies and exorcise the spirits that have taken possession of the premises. Can you survive the 8 rounds through these mysterious exhibition halls?

item.title: Database Detective: Minor Crimes Division（新規追加）
item.description: A new (unpaid) work from home opportunity has opened up in Calizorania! Become Los Zorangeles Police Department’s new Database Detective and help solve small criminal cases through the power of SQL queries.
item.content:encoded:
A new (unpaid) work from home opportunity has opened up in Calizorania! Become Los Zorangeles Police Department’s new Database Detective and help solve small criminal cases through the power of SQL queries.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Pawnbroker Simulator（新規追加）
item.description: Welcome to Pawnbroker Simulator, where you're the boss. Build your shop, strike deals, and test your business savvy in this indie simulation game. Dive into a world of trade and management. Can you make it big in the world of pawnbroking? Time to find out!
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Pawnbroker Simulator, where you're the boss. Build your shop, strike deals, and test your business savvy in this indie simulation game. Dive into a world of trade and management. Can you make it big in the world of pawnbroking? Time to find out!

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Hollow Ground（新規追加）
item.description: Play as four mercenaries as they descend into the Epsilon9 bunker. Navigate 60+ handcrafted labyrinthine levels, purchase upgrades, and destroy chaos manifest: The Machine. The blend of old-school arcade action and true focus on tactics sets this game apart from an ordinary shooter.
item.content:encoded:
Play as four mercenaries as they descend into the Epsilon9 bunker. Navigate 60+ handcrafted labyrinthine levels, purchase upgrades, and destroy chaos manifest: The Machine. The blend of old-school arcade action and true focus on tactics sets this game apart from an ordinary shooter.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: GODWAY（新規追加）
item.description: “Run on the rails, overcome obstacles, and try to reach the top!”
item.content:encoded:
“Run on the rails, overcome obstacles, and try to reach the top!”

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Ex Machina Pecto（新規追加）
item.description: Forge, trade, and command your forces in a next-gen card battler. Choose between classic duels, tactical warfare, or rogue-lite draft runs — then reshape your deck in a player-driven economy with no premium currency.
item.content:encoded:
Forge, trade, and command your forces in a next-gen card battler. Choose between classic duels, tactical warfare, or rogue-lite draft runs — then reshape your deck in a player-driven economy with no premium currency.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Hotel Sim（新規追加）
item.description: Welcome to Hotel Sim, a quirky hotel management game where you start from nothing and build your way up to a 5-star empire… or watch it all go up in flames.
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Hotel Sim, a quirky hotel management game where you start from nothing and build your way up to a 5-star empire… or watch it all go up in flames.

item.title: Bum: Revenge（新規追加）
item.description: First-person homeless crime sandbox. Steal, drink, hallucinate and crush rival bums in chaotic online co-op.
item.content:encoded:
First-person homeless crime sandbox. Steal, drink, hallucinate and crush rival bums in chaotic online co-op.

item.title: Devoid（新規追加）
item.description: Devoid is an immersive journey into the medieval world of vampires who feed on human souls. You will have to put an end to their power with the help of sword and magic. Use an arsenal of tools and magical abilities on your way to defeat the most ancient evil.
item.content:encoded:
Devoid is an immersive journey into the medieval world of vampires who feed on human souls. You will have to put an end to their power with the help of sword and magic. Use an arsenal of tools and magical abilities on your way to defeat the most ancient evil.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Milaneseria（新規追加）
item.description: In Milaneseria, you'll have to manage your own Milanese restaurant. Your mission is super simple: cook the coolest Milanese in the neighborhood, make sure you always have stock, and leave your customers more than satisfied.
item.content:encoded:
In Milaneseria, you'll have to manage your own Milanese restaurant. Your mission is super simple: cook the coolest Milanese in the neighborhood, make sure you always have stock, and leave your customers more than satisfied.

item.title: Karma Keepers（新規追加）
item.description: Karma Keepers is an idle/incremental souls sim where you guide souls, collect spiritual energy, upgrade and automate to keep corruption at bay, and push karma to the max to banish demons.
item.content:encoded:
Karma Keepers is an idle/incremental souls sim where you guide souls, collect spiritual energy, upgrade and automate to keep corruption at bay, and push karma to the max to banish demons.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Radiant Starlets（新規追加）
item.description: Radiant Starlets is a HD2D action platformer in the vein of classic action platformers but you can date all the bosses. Select your boss order and make your way through 8 challenging stages. Try every order and uncover the mysteries of this world.
item.content:encoded:
Radiant Starlets is a HD2D action platformer in the vein of classic action platformers but you can date all the bosses. Select your boss order and make your way through 8 challenging stages. Try every order and uncover the mysteries of this world.

item.description: A 2D adventure story about the daughter of a pharaoh who tries to change her predetermined destiny in the dark and mysterious Ancient Egypt.

item.title: Đồng Cỏ Lau - The Reed Field（新規追加）
item.description: An exploratory and non-linear adventure game, where each player’s experience may differ to some extent and requires careful investigation to reach the best ending (the game’s length depends on the ending you fall into). The worst ending will cause the game to end the earliest
item.content:encoded:
An exploratory and non-linear adventure game, where each player’s experience may differ to some extent and requires careful investigation to reach the best ending (the game’s length depends on the ending you fall into). The worst ending will cause the game to end the earliest

item.title: Druid of Hungwood（新規追加）
item.description: The village of Hungwood is under attack! But where are all the heroes? An evil knight has imprisoned them all, allowing enemies to wreak havoc! It's up to the merchant/leaf-caster Rodin to form a group of NPCs formidable enough to rescue the heroes and save Hungwood! A Lust to Win RPG/Visual Novel!
item.content:encoded:
The village of Hungwood is under attack! But where are all the heroes? An evil knight has imprisoned them all, allowing enemies to wreak havoc! It's up to the merchant/leaf-caster Rodin to form a group of NPCs formidable enough to rescue the heroes and save Hungwood! A Lust to Win RPG/Visual Novel!

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Dungeons of Eternity - Valentine's Day Cosmetic Skins（新規追加）
item.description: Show some love with this charming collection of Valentine’s Day-themed armor tints and the exclusive Winged Helmet! Transform your gear with stunning pink and crimson tints that replace the metal on any armor set.
item.content:encoded:
Show some love with this charming collection of Valentine’s Day-themed armor tints and the exclusive Winged Helmet! Transform your gear with stunning pink and crimson tints that replace the metal on any armor set.

item.title: 祇園回廊-GionKairou-（新規追加）
item.description: Set against the backdrop of a Japanese-style townscape reminiscent of Gion, this exploration-based horror game involves searching for “anomalies” and offering prayers. A work dedicated to those who feel bored with their daily lives.
item.content:encoded:
Set against the backdrop of a Japanese-style townscape reminiscent of Gion, this exploration-based horror game involves searching for “anomalies” and offering prayers. A work dedicated to those who feel bored with their daily lives.

item.title: Dungeons of Eternity - Skeleton Cosmetics（新規追加）
item.description: The Skeleton Cosmetics Pack comes with a variety of skeleton parts for your avatar. Go full undead skeleton warrior or mix-and-match with other avatar parts to create something unique! Bonus: Skeletal first person arms and hands!
item.content:encoded:
The Skeleton Cosmetics Pack comes with a variety of skeleton parts for your avatar. Go full undead skeleton warrior or mix-and-match with other avatar parts to create something unique! Bonus: Skeletal first person arms and hands!

item.title: Dungeons of Eternity - Supporter Bundle（新規追加）
item.description: The Patron Supporter Pack comes with a brand-new armor set and new gold armor accent colors you can apply to your existing cosmetics! Bonus: As a thank you for supporting the developers, your nickname in game will also show a golden skull next to it.
item.content:encoded:
The Patron Supporter Pack comes with a brand-new armor set and new gold armor accent colors you can apply to your existing cosmetics! Bonus: As a thank you for supporting the developers, your nickname in game will also show a golden skull next to it.

item.title: 欺心恋曲/亵渎神明的少女 Deceptiive Love Ballad The Blasphemer 偽りの恋の旋律/神を冒涜する少女（新規追加）
item.description: Faced with aggressive detectives, I—"Zilin·SAI"—seemed unable to clear my suspicions. At the critical moment, a mysterious caller contacted me: "I can help you, but the price is to go to the mansion where 'demons' reside." A dark fantasy tale of mind games and romance begins now...
item.content:encoded:
Faced with aggressive detectives, I—"Zilin·SAI"—seemed unable to clear my suspicions. At the critical moment, a mysterious caller contacted me: "I can help you, but the price is to go to the mansion where 'demons' reside." A dark fantasy tale of mind games and romance begins now...

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Dungeons of Eternity - Zombie Cosmetics（新規追加）
item.description: The Zombie Cosmetics Pack comes with a variety of zombie parts for your avatar. Creep around the lobby and dungeons as a full zombie or mix-and-match with other avatar parts to create something unique! Bonus: Zombified first person arms and hands!
item.content:encoded:
The Zombie Cosmetics Pack comes with a variety of zombie parts for your avatar. Creep around the lobby and dungeons as a full zombie or mix-and-match with other avatar parts to create something unique! Bonus: Zombified first person arms and hands!

item.title: Dungeons of Eternity - Avatar Cape Collection（新規追加）
item.description: Level up your dungeon hero with this unique collection of capes and cloaks, from regal and flowing to rugged and battle-worn designs. Mix and match with other cosmetics to create a look that’s uniquely yours. Stand out in the depths of the dungeons with style!
item.content:encoded:
Level up your dungeon hero with this unique collection of capes and cloaks, from regal and flowing to rugged and battle-worn designs. Mix and match with other cosmetics to create a look that’s uniquely yours. Stand out in the depths of the dungeons with style!

item.title: Duelmasters（新規追加）
item.description: Battle your friends in fast-paced 1v1 arena brawler style duels. Choose from axe, sword, or spear, each with its own strengths, and fight through intense rounds. Outplay your opponent, become champion of the arena, and earn the title of Duelmaster!
item.content:encoded:
Battle your friends in fast-paced 1v1 arena brawler style duels. Choose from axe, sword, or spear, each with its own strengths, and fight through intense rounds. Outplay your opponent, become champion of the arena, and earn the title of Duelmaster!

item.title: Chain-Em（新規追加）
item.description: If you like movement shooters, CHAINS, slowmo, speedrunning, parkour... aand getting paralyzed??? ...Well then just buy the game...Chain-em is an FPS movement "boom" shooter where you move at insane speeds, dodge bullets in slowmo and CHAIN your enemies in a retro style setting. CHAINCHAINCHAINCHAIN

item.title: [ MURMUR ]（新規追加）
item.description: [ MURMUR ] is a psychological horror game about anomaly detection. Observe, listen, and survive within a house that constantly shifts… But beware: sometimes, a single whisper is enough to seal your fate.
item.content:encoded:
[ MURMUR ] is a psychological horror game about anomaly detection. Observe, listen, and survive within a house that constantly shifts… But beware: sometimes, a single whisper is enough to seal your fate.

item.content:encoded:

item.description: Command respect in the depths with this legendary assortment of helmets and headwear, from ornate crowns to battle-scarred helms. From samurai to sailor to monarch, these headpieces bring gravitas to your dungeon persona. Lead with glory, look the part!

item.title: Knockout Battle（新規追加）
item.description: Knockout Battle is a chaotic and fun multiplayer party game where up to 8 players clash in fully interactive sandbox arenas. The objective is simple yet endlessly entertaining: knock your friends out and hurl them into the void to secure victory!
item.content:encoded:
Knockout Battle is a chaotic and fun multiplayer party game where up to 8 players clash in fully interactive sandbox arenas. The objective is simple yet endlessly entertaining: knock your friends out and hurl them into the void to secure victory!

item.title: Cthulhu 1920（新規追加）
item.description: Step into the eerie world of Cthulhu 1920, a strategic card game where sanity is your lifeline. Players navigate a grid-based playfield, battling enemies, collecting items, and using weapons and long forgotten artifacts to survive.
item.content:encoded:
Step into the eerie world of Cthulhu 1920, a strategic card game where sanity is your lifeline. Players navigate a grid-based playfield, battling enemies, collecting items, and using weapons and long forgotten artifacts to survive.

item.title: Little Old One and the Witch（新規追加）
item.description: It’s a rogue lite tower defense where you throw skills at endless enemies but with an awkward moral dilemmas, tough questions without easy answers, and bit of sarcastic humor. I’m not here to shove ideas down your throat. The world is already cruel enough. I’d rather just stay home and make games.
item.content:encoded:
It’s a rogue lite tower defense where you throw skills at endless enemies but with an awkward moral dilemmas, tough questions without easy answers, and bit of sarcastic humor. I’m not here to shove ideas down your throat. The world is already cruel enough. I’d rather just stay home and make games.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Astraeus Odyssey（新規追加）
item.description: Astraeus Odyssey is a 1–4 player co-op sci-fi survival game where you explore alien worlds, build bases, and struggle to keep your crew alive after the fall of your home planet. You’ll manage resources, navigate hostile environments, and endure supernatural threats as you search for a new home.
item.content:encoded:
Astraeus Odyssey is a 1–4 player co-op sci-fi survival game where you explore alien worlds, build bases, and struggle to keep your crew alive after the fall of your home planet. You’ll manage resources, navigate hostile environments, and endure supernatural threats as you search for a new home.

item.title: Cardboard Tanks（新規追加）
item.description: Expand the world with up to four players, choose your own path and reach as far as you can. Nearly every part of the environment is destructible. Drill through it to reach your goals. Destroy your enemies to gain upgrades and progress further. Shop for game changing mechanics.
item.content:encoded:
Expand the world with up to four players, choose your own path and reach as far as you can. Nearly every part of the environment is destructible. Drill through it to reach your goals. Destroy your enemies to gain upgrades and progress further. Shop for game changing mechanics.

item.title: Banish 9 to 5（新規追加）
item.description: A 2D PvP asymmetric multiplayer party game of mischief, pranks, and unexpected turnarounds. Four Spirits cause chaos while a lone Banisher banishes them down. Getting banished doesn’t mean it’s over — you turn into a Banisher and chase your old teammates.
item.content:encoded:
A 2D PvP asymmetric multiplayer party game of mischief, pranks, and unexpected turnarounds. Four Spirits cause chaos while a lone Banisher banishes them down. Getting banished doesn’t mean it’s over — you turn into a Banisher and chase your old teammates.

item.title: Good Human（新規追加）
item.description: How far would you go to have a friend? In Good Human, you control someone desperate to connect with another person. Their intentions may be innocent… but the consequences might not be. A short, intense, and psychological experience where the line between innocence and the disturbing becomes blurred.
item.content:encoded:
How far would you go to have a friend? In Good Human, you control someone desperate to connect with another person. Their intentions may be innocent… but the consequences might not be. A short, intense, and psychological experience where the line between innocence and the disturbing becomes blurred.

item.title: World of Tanks — Škoda T 27 Pack (VIII Czechoslovakian Medium Tank)（新規追加）
item.description: The T 27 was part of a project to harmonize the Czechoslovakian fleet, which, at the end of the gruelling Second World War, was a jumbled and international mixture of armored vehicles. This tank is an autoloader, so you can fire bursts at your enemy before they even know you're there!
item.content:encoded:
The T 27 was part of a project to harmonize the Czechoslovakian fleet, which, at the end of the gruelling Second World War, was a jumbled and international mixture of armored vehicles. This tank is an autoloader, so you can fire bursts at your enemy before they even know you're there!

item.description: The M4A1 Revalorisé is the French twist on the M4 Sherman, which the country received from the U.S. through the MDAP program after WWII. The goal was to improve the firepower, and it worked!
item.content:encoded:
The M4A1 Revalorisé is the French twist on the M4 Sherman, which the country received from the U.S. through the MDAP program after WWII. The goal was to improve the firepower, and it worked!

item.title: The Last Key（新規追加）
item.description: The Last Key is a straight forward casual survival horror game. With 12 levels per difficulty, and AI driven monsters so every time you play the experience will be different. Search for items to help you survive and lost keys to unlock doors. Escape and win your life, or fail and be stuck forever.
item.content:encoded:
The Last Key is a straight forward casual survival horror game. With 12 levels per difficulty, and AI driven monsters so every time you play the experience will be different. Search for items to help you survive and lost keys to unlock doors. Escape and win your life, or fail and be stuck forever.
